timeline.message: Add callback when email task gets queued

timeline.bodyText: remote params shouldn't be null at this point, because of the shouldQueueTaskForInit check. Why is it needed?
timeline.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: When there is a connection issue and the remote configuration is not previously setup, then getRemoteParams() is Null and this is the breaking point for the issue found.
replies.author: andrespelaezp

replies.bodyText: Sry I might be missing some part, but shouldQueueTaskForInit check for remote == null, if remote is still null because the network failed, then the task should be queue again, or why is it not being queue again?
replies.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: It does get queued, but it also continues evaluating the statements below. Another approach could be a return statement within the task schedule block, what do you think?
replies.author: andrespelaezp

replies.bodyText: oooh I see, that method is missing the return! good catch, so that is why is failing
replies.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: No other changes should be needed but the return stmt
replies.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: compare with the other methods using shouldQueueTaskForInit
replies.author: Jeasmine

replies.bodyText: This is redundant code, the shouldQueueTaskForInit check and the return added above would cover this so I think we should remove the null check that was added in this PR.
replies.author: jkasten2

timeline.message: Added return statement inside setEmail shouldQueueTaskForInit

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think we should change / add new APIs to address this bug fix PR. However I am open to a proposal on a new API to best handle this scenario for all our methods for consistency.
Just some feedback on the API itself though, I would expect a return value from setEmail instead of a callback that it has been queued.
timeline.author: jkasten2

replies.bodyText: Noted, I will keep this in mind for a future integration
replies.author: andrespelaezp

timeline.message: Removed callback for email task queued
Removed callback for email task queued

timeline.bodyText: This also needs to be removed
timeline.author: jkasten2

timeline.bodyText: TravisCI is failing due to a Java compile error due to this interface method no longer existing.
timeline.author: jkasten2

timeline.message: Removed email task callback from MainOneSignalClassRunner
